<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blazing Streak](/Feats.aspx?ID=2984) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 202 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Stoked Flame Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2981)

**Requirements**
You're in Stoked Flame Stance.

</column>

---

Stride twice, making Strikes against up to four different creatures within reach at any point during your movement. Flashing sparks Strikes made during Blazing Streak deal fire damage instead of slashing.
name: Blazing Streak
